item.title: Pseudo R Squared
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(descr) # make reproducible set.seed(1234) # number of points nn <- 100 # An Simulated Model -------------------------------------------------------- # simulate binary response y <- rbinom(nn, 1, prob = .5) # single predictor x <- y + rnorm(nn, mean = 1, sd = .5) cor(x, y) ## [1] 0.7404515 # null model (without any predictor) null_mod <- glm(y ~ 1, family = "binomial") # we know x is inheritly random some_mod <- glm(y ~ x, family = "binomial") # glance summary(some_mod) ## ## Call: ## glm(formula = y ~ x, family = "binomial") ## ## Deviance Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -2.
